reviewText: we ordered this because we already saw it on  TBN and  wanted to share it with our 9 grown kids and others. It is really good:) Praise God forever. All the kids are already saved, but I KNEW it would inspire them big time. Jesus Christ is one amazing and true God. Known him since I was 8. ...has helped me through the roughest places that I made messes for myself, and he has kept all the kids through the years 21-35 currently:)Never turning back:) I am never turning back. I found the right way and the meaning of this whole boot camp life!!!!!!! :) :)

I found this documentary, "Changed Lives: Miracles of the Passion" to be inspiring.  I wish there were more stories covered in the documentary and would like to have seen something of Mel Gibson's reaction.

I saw this movie on TV the first time and decided that I just MUST have it.  I own the Passion of the Christ and so this makes the perfect partner to it.  It always fascinates me to watch it again.  A really uplifting piece of work.

Due to the low price of DVD, I was skeptical about the quality of the DVD, but it was great. I have already showed it in a maximum security prison. It was also shipped quickly.
Thanks,
Hugo

Don't let dvd features fool u when it says Caption closed. I don't think there is one. I would rather watch on youtube with google text. Still yea it is inspiring and true story! I read it in book already , I fall in love
I purchased a few copies of this last year. I love it. Very educational and touching . Fast shipping. Thank you

I saw this on PAX and was amazed. A lot of people saw The Passion of the Christ and this documentary has a lot of real miracles that happened to people who saw it. I loved the story of the little girl who drowned and came back to life, and the guy in New York who hated god. It makes me think about what God can do in this messed up world. It's really amazing.
